sense.def:
Kdor ima
experience of something
, je nekaj že videl, storil ali občutil.

seg.quote: The new countries have no experience of democracy.

sense.def:
Vse stvari, ki so se nam zgodile, lahko imenujemo
experience
.

seg.quote: Everyone learns best from his own experience.

sense.def:
An experience
je nekaj, kar se nam zgodi ali kar storimo.

seg.quote: Moving house can be a traumatic experience.

sense.def:
To experience a situation or feeling
pomeni, da se nam nekaj zgodi ali vpliva na nas.

seg.quote: Similar problems have been experienced by other students.
